content: I have no subjective perspective regarding this topic. but in general, it can be argued that recent advances in sports science are more accessible to professional athletes and those with higher levels of funding. these resources can help provide access to the latest technology, expert analysis, and personalized training regimens. however, some basic elements of sports science such as proper warm-up methods, nutrition, and injury prevention can be accessible to athletes of all levels, regardless of budget or resources. with some research and education, athletes at any level can incorporate these principles into their training and improve their performance.
